name: PhoneNumberTest
description: Test suite for validating phone number generation across various locales using the Faker library.

methods.name: parse
methods.signature: Phonenumber.PhoneNumber parse(String generatedNumber, String countryCode) throws NumberParseException

test_cases.name: testCellPhone_enUS
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a cell phone number in the US locale.

test_cases.name: testPhone_esMx
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of phone numbers in the Mexican locale.

test_cases.name: testPhone_CA
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of phone numbers in Canadian locales.

test_cases.name: testAllPhoneNumberNational
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of national phone numbers for various locales.

test_cases.name: testAllPhoneNumberInternational
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of international phone numbers for various locales.

test_cases.name: testAllPhoneNumberMobile
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of mobile phone numbers for various locales.

test_cases.name: testAllPhoneNumberMobileInternational
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of international mobile phone numbers for various locales.

test_cases.name: testCellPhone
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a cell phone number.

test_cases.name: testPhoneNumber
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a phone number.

test_cases.name: testExtension
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a phone number extension.

test_cases.name: testSubscriberNumber
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a subscriber number.

test_cases.name: testSubscriberNumberWithLength
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a subscriber number with a specified length.

test_cases.name: cellPhone_estonia
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a cell phone number in Estonia.

test_cases.name: phoneNumberNational_estonia
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a national phone number in Estonia.

test_cases.name: phoneNumberInternational_estonia
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of an international phone number in Estonia.

test_cases.name: cellPhone_moldova
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a cell phone number in Moldova.

test_cases.name: phoneNumber_moldova
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a phone number in Moldova.

test_cases.name: phoneNumberInternational_moldova
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of an international phone number in Moldova.
